title: NRRI Recruitment 2026 - Walk-in-Interview for Field Assistant Posts
description: The National Rice Research Institute (NRRI) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Field Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, ITI, and 12th can grab this chance and apply for the NRRI Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. If you are ...
